resources.string: Beast mode helps with ussd codes that fail to work when chained.

Custom codes are saved automatically whenever you dial any ussd codes but all you can manually save your custom codes by tapping the button with "+" symbol 
 

 Steps for saving codes
 1.click the button having "+" symbol 
 2.enter the name, it can be any word 
 3.then enter the network , it can be airtel, mtn or anyother network 
 4.there after enter the code eg *131#,
 5.finally click the big add button at the bottom 
 

 Optional.
 you can also add additional fields
 for entering information later on ie a field for entering the telephone,or an amount. This is done by clicking the add steps button.

The app works on all networks but only the following networks have default codes saved.
 1.Mtn uganda 
 2.Airtel uganda 
 3.Africell uganda 
 4.Lyca Mobile uganda 
 

For other networks, ussd codes are saved automatically whenever you dial a ussd or when you save the ussd codes manually.

To allow quick codes to auto detect and save ussd codes that you normally use for quick access in the app, enable this functionality by tapping the switch button in the upper right corner, then press OK on the next screen.Press the back button twice to return to QuickCodes.
